source-layers.sql: SELECT the_geom_webmercator, borocd, CASE WHEN LEFT(borocd::text, 1) = '1' THEN 'Manhattan ' || borocd % 100 WHEN LEFT(borocd::text, 1) = '2' THEN 'Bronx ' || borocd % 100 WHEN LEFT(borocd::text, 1) = '3' THEN 'Brooklyn ' || borocd % 100 WHEN LEFT(borocd::text, 1) = '4' THEN 'Queens ' || borocd % 100 WHEN LEFT(borocd::text, 1) = '5' THEN 'Staten Island ' || borocd % 100 END as boro_district FROM pff_2020_community_districts_21c WHERE borocd % 100 < 20
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, ntaname, ntaname AS id, a.nta2020 AS geoid FROM pff_2020_ntas_21c a WHERE ntaname NOT ILIKE 'park-cemetery-etc%' AND ntaname != 'Airport'
SELECT ST_Centroid(the_geom_webmercator) as the_geom_webmercator, ntaname FROM pff_2020_ntas_21c WHERE ntaname NOT ILIKE 'park-cemetery-etc%'
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, puma, puma AS id, puma AS geoid FROM dcp_puma
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, borocd, borocd AS geolabel, borocd as geoid FROM pff_2020_community_districts_21c
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, city AS geolabel, city AS geoid FROM pff_2020_city_21c
SELECT ST_Centroid(the_geom_webmercator) as the_geom_webmercator, cdtaname FROM pff_2020_cdtas_21c
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, label1 || '/' || label2 AS boro_boundary FROM bk_qn_mh_boundary
